title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4252.7 - Fund accounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4252.7 - Fund accounts

State Regulations

Each participating investment entity shall deposit program
funds and program related investment proceeds (including, without limiting the
foregoing, returns and interest) into a bank account in a State or federally
chartered banking institution, satisfactory to the corporation, or as otherwise
agreed in writing between the corporation and the investment
entity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4252.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
